questions.title: 我的小儿子说我是他最爱的人。
questions.answer: My youngest son says I am the one he loves best.

questions.title: 我听说我们大学的假期将会被推迟。
questions.answer: I hear the vacation of our university will be put off.

questions.title: 我希望中国的贫富差距可以缩小。
questions.answer: I hope the gap between rich and poor people in China can be reduced.

questions.title: 我恐怕你会错过你的航班。
questions.answer: I'm afraid you will be late for your plane.

questions.title: 我相信他的帮助能起作用。
questions.answer: I'm sure his help can work.

title: ——我知道每个第一眼见到我的人都会爱上我。
——你未免也太自信了。

answer.en: I know everyone who see me for the first time will fall in love with me.
You are too sure about yourself.

title: ——我相信我丈夫一定回来接我的。
——你有一个体贴的丈夫。

answer.en: I believe my husband is sure to pick up me.
